titleStmt.title: Orders conceiued by the lords of her Maiesties Priuie Counsell, and by her Highnesse speciall direction commanded to be put in execution for the restraint of killing, and eating of flesh this next Lent, and to be executed aswell by the lord maior within the city and suburbes of London, and by the officers of the liberties and exempt places in and about the same, as by order to be prescribed by the lords lieutenants of all the counties of the realme, to the iustices of peace, lords of liberties, and officers of corporall townes : 1. March, 45. yeere of her Maiesties Reigne.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Privy Council.
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
